short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to make notes inside your chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple and easy to use notepad extension for your chrome Browser.

Features:
------- Can add Multiple notes.
------- Title of notes is going to be the first few characters of your note.
------- you can search for any phrase and get a list of all the notes where that phrase appears.
------- You can delete a note temporarily.
------- You can restore or permanently delete a note from recyle bin section.

It automaticaly sync and get saved.

Developer : Adarsh Kumar Khosla, Khoslaadarsh@gmail.com
